REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f1661 reute u f BC-CREDITANSTALT-ARRANGE 03-30 0056

TEXT.TITLE: CREDITANSTALT ARRANGES 100 MLN STG CD PROGRAM
TEXT.BODY: Creditanstalt-Bankverein <CABV.VI>, the largest commercial bank in Austria, has arranged a 100 mln stg certificate of deposit program, banking sources said. The dealers for the program will be S.G. Warburg and Co Ltd and County NatWest Capital Markets Ltd. REUTER
